title: Does Bobby Have A Girlfriend? + Why Amy’s Son Was Sent Home From School + Name That Country Artist Tour Rider
itunes:title: Does Bobby Have A Girlfriend? + Why Amy’s Son Was Sent Home From School + Name That Country Artist Tour Rider
description:
Amy got a call from her son’s school about him needing to be sent home. She said he was embarrassed about it. Bobby answers questions from the text line including one about whether or not he has a girlfriend right now. We play “Name That Country Artist Tour Rider” where we have to match the requests to the famous country singer.  Eddie pressures Bobby into online gambling. Hit songwriter and artist Jessi Alexander stops by the studio to share new music. Plus, Bobby reads lots of listener questions!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
